1: וַ֭יַּעַן <sup>6030 </sup> <n>Then answered</n> אֱלִיפַ֥ז <sup>464 </sup> <n>Eliphaz</n> הַֽתֵּימָנִ֗י <sup>8489 </sup> <n>the Temanite</n> וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n>
2: הֶֽחָכָ֗ם <sup>2450 </sup> <n>Should a wise man</n> יַעֲנֶ֥ה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>utter</n> דַֽעַת־ <sup>1847 </sup> <n>knowledge</n> ר֑וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>vain</n> וִֽימַלֵּ֖א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>and fill</n> קָדִ֣ים <sup>6921 </sup> <n>the east</n> בִּטְנֽוֹ׃ <sup>990 </sup> <n>his belly</n>
3: הוֹכֵ֣חַ <sup>3198 </sup> <n>Should he reason</n> בְּ֭דָבָר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>talk</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִסְכּ֑וֹן <sup>5532 </sup> <n>with unprofitable</n> וּ֝מִלִּ֗ים <sup>4405 </sup> <n>words</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יוֹעִ֥יל <sup>3276 </sup> <n>wherewith he can do no good</n> בָּֽם׃
4: אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>Indeed</n> אַ֭תָּה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> תָּפֵ֣ר <sup>6565 </sup> <n>Yea thou castest off</n> יִרְאָ֑ה <sup>3374 </sup> <n>fear</n> וְתִגְרַ֥ע <sup>1639 </sup> <n>and restrainest</n> שִׂ֝יחָ֗ה <sup>7881 </sup> <n>prayer</n> לִפְנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אֵֽל׃ <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n>
5: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יְאַלֵּ֣ף <sup>502 </sup> <n>uttereth</n> עֲוֹנְךָ֣ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>thine iniquity</n> פִ֑יךָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>For thy mouth</n> וְ֝תִבְחַ֗ר <sup>977 </sup> <n>and thou choosest</n> לְשׁ֣וֹן <sup>3956 </sup> <n>the tongue</n> עֲרוּמִֽים׃ <sup>6175 </sup> <n>of the crafty</n>
6: יַרְשִֽׁיעֲךָ֣ <sup>7561 </sup> <n>condemneth</n> פִ֣יךָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>Thine own mouth</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> אָ֑נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> וּ֝שְׂפָתֶ֗יךָ <sup>8193 </sup> <n>thee and not I yea thine own lips</n> יַעֲנוּ־ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>testify</n> בָֽךְ׃
7: הֲרִאישׁ֣וֹן <sup>7223 </sup> <n>the first</n> אָ֭דָם <sup>120 </sup> <n>man</n> תִּוָּלֵ֑ד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>[that] was born</n> וְלִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> גְבָע֣וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>hill</n> חוֹלָֽלְתָּ׃ <sup>2342 </sup> <n>? or wast thou made</n>
8: הַבְס֣וֹד <sup>5475 </sup> <n>the secret</n> אֱל֣וֹהַ <sup>433 </sup> <n>of God</n> תִּשְׁמָ֑ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hast thou heard</n> וְתִגְרַ֖ע <sup>1639 </sup> <n>and limit</n> אֵלֶ֣יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> חָכְמָֽה׃ <sup>2451 </sup> <n>wisdom</n>
9: מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> יָּ֭דַעְתָּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>What knowest</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נֵדָ֑ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>thou that we know</n> תָּ֝בִ֗ין <sup>995 </sup> <n>not? [what] understandest</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> עִמָּ֥נוּ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> הֽוּא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n>
10: גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Both</n> שָׂ֣ב <sup>7867 </sup> <n>With us [are] both the grayheaded</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Both</n> יָשִׁ֣ישׁ <sup>3453 </sup> <n>and very aged</n> בָּ֑נוּ כַּבִּ֖יר <sup>3524 </sup> <n>men much</n> מֵאָבִ֣יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>than thy father</n> יָמִֽים׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>elder</n>
11: הַמְעַ֣ט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>small</n> מִ֭מְּךָ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>too</n> תַּנְחֻמ֣וֹת <sup>8575 </sup> <n>[Are] the consolations</n> אֵ֑ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>of God</n> וְ֝דָבָ֗ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>thing</n> לָאַ֥ט <sup>328 </sup> <n>with thee? is there any secret</n> עִמָּֽךְ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
12: מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> יִּקָּחֲךָ֥ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>carry thee away</n> לִבֶּ֑ךָ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>Why doth thine heart</n> וּֽמַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>and why</n> יִּרְזְמ֥וּן <sup>7335 </sup> <n>wink at</n> עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>? and what do thy eyes</n>
13: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> תָשִׁ֣יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>That thou turnest</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> אֵ֣ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>against God</n> רוּחֶ֑ךָ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>thy spirit</n> וְהֹצֵ֖אתָ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>go out</n> מִפִּ֣יךָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>according</n> מִלִּֽין׃ <sup>4405 </sup> <n>and lettest [such] words</n>
14: מָֽה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> אֱנ֥וֹשׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>What [is] man</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יִזְכֶּ֑ה <sup>2135 </sup> <n>that he should be clean</n> וְכִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יִ֝צְדַּ֗ק <sup>6663 </sup> <n>that he should be righteous</n> יְל֣וּד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>? and [he which is] born</n> אִשָּֽׁה׃ <sup>802 </sup> <n>of a woman</n>
15: הֵ֣ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> [בִּקְדֹשֹׁו כ] (בִּ֭קְדֹשָׁיו <sup>6918 </sup> <n>holy</n> ק) לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יַאֲמִ֑ין <sup>539 </sup> <n>Behold he putteth no trust</n> וְ֝שָׁמַ֗יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>yea the heavens</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> זַכּ֥וּ <sup>2141 </sup> <n>are not clean</n> בְעֵינָֽיו׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in his sight</n>
16: אַ֭ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>How</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נִתְעָ֥ב <sup>8581 </sup> <n>How much more abominable</n> וְֽנֶאֱלָ֑ח <sup>444 </sup> <n>and filthy</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>[is] man</n> שֹׁתֶ֖ה <sup>8354 </sup> <n>which drinketh</n> כַמַּ֣יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> עַוְלָֽה׃ <sup>5766 </sup> <n>iniquity</n>
17: אֲחַוְךָ֥ <sup>2331 </sup> <n>I will shew</n> שְֽׁמַֽע־ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>thee hear</n> לִ֑י וְזֶֽה־ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>and what</n> חָ֝זִ֗יתִי <sup>2372 </sup> <n>me and that [which] I have seen</n> וַאֲסַפֵּֽרָה׃ <sup>5608 </sup> <n>I will declare</n>
18: אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>What</n> חֲכָמִ֥ים <sup>2450 </sup> <n>Which wise</n> יַגִּ֑ידוּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>men have told</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> כִֽ֝חֲד֗וּ <sup>3582 </sup> <n>and have not hid</n> מֵאֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>from their fathers</n>
19: לָהֶ֣ם לְ֭בַדָּם <sup>905 </sup> <n>alone</n> נִתְּנָ֣ה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>was given</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>Unto whom alone the earth</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and no</n> עָ֖בַר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>passed</n> זָ֣ר <sup>2114 </sup> <n>and no stranger</n> בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n>
20: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יְמֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>with pain all [his] days</n> רָ֭שָׁע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>The wicked</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> מִתְחוֹלֵ֑ל <sup>2342 </sup> <n>man travaileth</n> וּמִסְפַּ֥ר <sup>4557 </sup> <n>and the number</n> שָׁ֝נִ֗ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>of years</n> נִצְפְּנ֥וּ <sup>6845 </sup> <n>is hidden</n> לֶעָרִֽיץ׃ <sup>6184 </sup> <n>to the oppressor</n>
21: קוֹל־ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>sound</n> פְּחָדִ֥ים <sup>6343 </sup> <n>A dreadful</n> בְּאָזְנָ֑יו <sup>241 </sup> <n>[is] in his ears</n> בַּ֝שָּׁל֗וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>in prosperity</n> שׁוֹדֵ֥ד <sup>7703 </sup> <n>the destroyer</n> יְבוֹאֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n>
22: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יַאֲמִ֣ין <sup>539 </sup> <n>He believeth</n> שׁ֭וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>not that he shall return</n> מִנִּי־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>out of darkness</n> [וְצָפוּ כ] (וְצָפ֖וּי <sup>6822 </sup> <n>behold</n> ק) ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אֱלֵי־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>for</n> חָֽרֶב׃ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>for of the sword</n>
23: נֹ֘דֵ֤ד <sup>5074 </sup> <n>He wandereth abroad</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לַלֶּ֣חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>for bread</n> אַיֵּ֑ה <sup>344 </sup> <n>kite</n> יָדַ֓ע ׀ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[saying] Where [is it]? he knoweth</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נָכ֖וֹן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>is ready</n> בְּיָד֣וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>at his hand</n> יֽוֹם־ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>that the day</n> חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>of darkness</n>
24: יְֽ֭בַעֲתֻהוּ <sup>1204 </sup> <n>shall make him afraid</n> צַ֣ר <sup>6862 </sup> <n>Trouble</n> וּמְצוּקָ֑ה <sup>4691 </sup> <n>and anguish</n> תִּ֝תְקְפֵ֗הוּ <sup>8630 </sup> <n>they shall prevail</n> כְּמֶ֤לֶךְ ׀ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>against him as a king</n> עָתִ֬יד <sup>6264 </sup> <n>ready</n> לַכִּידֽוֹר׃ <sup>3593 </sup> <n>to the battle</n>
25: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> נָטָ֣ה <sup>5186 </sup> <n>For he stretcheth out</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> אֵ֣ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>against God</n> יָד֑וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hand</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <sup>7706 </sup> <n>himself against the Almighty</n> יִתְגַּבָּֽר׃ <sup>1396 </sup> <n>and strengtheneth</n>
26: יָר֣וּץ <sup>7323 </sup> <n>He runneth</n> אֵלָ֣יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בְּצַוָּ֑אר <sup>6677 </sup> <n>upon him [even] on [his] neck</n> בַּ֝עֲבִ֗י <sup>5672 </sup> <n>upon the thick</n> גַּבֵּ֥י <sup>1354 </sup> <n>bosses</n> מָֽגִנָּֽיו׃ <sup>4043 </sup> <n>of his bucklers</n>
27: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כִסָּ֣ה <sup>3680 </sup> <n>Because he covereth</n> פָנָ֣יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>his face</n> בְּחֶלְבּ֑וֹ <sup>2459 </sup> <n>with his fatness</n> וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and maketh</n> פִּימָ֣ה <sup>6371 </sup> <n>collops of fat</n> עֲלֵי־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כָֽסֶל׃ <sup>3689 </sup> <n>on [his] flanks</n>
28: וַיִּשְׁכּ֤וֹן ׀ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>And he dwelleth</n> עָ֘רִ֤ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> נִכְחָד֗וֹת <sup>3582 </sup> <n>in desolate</n> בָּ֭תִּים <sup>1004 </sup> <n>[and] in houses</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יֵ֣שְׁבוּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>which no man inhabiteth</n> לָ֑מוֹ אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Which</n> הִתְעַתְּד֣וּ <sup>6257 </sup> <n>which are ready</n> לְגַלִּֽים׃ <sup>1530 </sup> <n>to become heaps</n>
29: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יֶ֭עְשַׁר <sup>6238 </sup> <n>He shall not be rich</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יָק֣וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>continue</n> חֵיל֑וֹ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>neither shall his substance</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יִטֶּ֖ה <sup>5186 </sup> <n>neither shall he prolong</n> לָאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>thereof upon the earth</n> מִנְלָֽם׃ <sup>4512 </sup> <n>the perfection</n>
30: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>He will not</n> יָס֨וּר ׀ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>He shall not depart</n> מִנִּי־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> חֹ֗שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>out of darkness</n> יֹֽ֭נַקְתּוֹ <sup>3127 </sup> <n>his branches</n> תְּיַבֵּ֣שׁ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>shall dry up</n> שַׁלְהָ֑בֶת <sup>7957 </sup> <n>the flame</n> וְ֝יָס֗וּר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>shall he go away</n> בְּר֣וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>and by the breath</n> פִּֽיו׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>of his mouth</n>
31: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יַאֲמֵ֣ן <sup>539 </sup> <n>trust</n> [בַּשֹּׁו כ] (בַּשָּׁ֣יו <sup>7723 </sup> <n>emptiness</n> ק) נִתְעָ֑ה <sup>8582 </sup> <n>Let not him that is deceived</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>in</n> שָׁ֝֗וְא <sup>7723 </sup> <n>in vanity</n> תִּהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> תְמוּרָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>8545 </sup> <n>shall be his recompence</n>
32: בְּֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>before</n> י֭וֹמוֹ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>his time</n> תִּמָּלֵ֑א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>It shall be accomplished</n> וְ֝כִפָּת֗וֹ <sup>3712 </sup> <n>and his branch</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>before</n> רַעֲנָֽנָה׃ <sup>7488 </sup> <n>shall not be green</n>
33: יַחְמֹ֣ס <sup>2554 </sup> <n>He shall shake off</n> כַּגֶּ֣פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>as the vine</n> בִּסְר֑וֹ <sup>1154 </sup> <n>his unripe grape</n> וְיַשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>and shall cast off</n> כַּ֝זַּ֗יִת <sup>2132 </sup> <n>as the olive</n> נִצָּתֽוֹ׃ <sup>5328 </sup> <n>his flower</n>
34: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> עֲדַ֣ת <sup>5712 </sup> <n>For the congregation</n> חָנֵ֣ף <sup>2611 </sup> <n>of hypocrites</n> גַּלְמ֑וּד <sup>1565 </sup> <n>[shall be] desolate</n> וְ֝אֵ֗שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>and fire</n> אָכְלָ֥ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall consume</n> אָֽהֳלֵי־ <sup>168 </sup> <n>the tabernacles</n> שֹֽׁחַד׃ <sup>7810 </sup> <n>of bribery</n>
35: הָרֹ֣ה <sup>2029 </sup> <n>They conceive</n> עָ֭מָל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>mischief</n> וְיָ֣לֹד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and bring forth</n> אָ֑וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>vanity</n> וּ֝בִטְנָ֗ם <sup>990 </sup> <n>and their belly</n> תָּכִ֥ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>prepareth</n> מִרְמָֽה׃ <sup>4820 </sup> <n>deceit</n> ס
